【C】During your turn, this card gets +1000 Power.
【A】【CXCOMBO】When this card attacks, if 「そして竜虎は神に挑まん」 is in your Climax Slot, and you have 2 or more other 《ゲーム》 Character, look at up to 4 cards from your top Deck, choose up to 1 《ゲーム》 Character and show it to opponent, add it to Hand, place the remaining cards into Waiting Room, during this turn, this card gets +1000 Power.

【C】EXPERIENCE If 「切り取られた風景 英梨々」 and 「新たなる選択肢 詩羽」 is in your Level Slot, this card gets -1 Level in your Hand.
【A】When this card is placed on Stage from Hand, choose up to 1 Character with Level same or lower than your Level from your Hand, place it into any slot on Stage, during this turn, this card gets +2000 Power.
【A】[(1)] At the beginning of opponent's Attack Phase, you may pay the cost. If you did, choose 1 of your other 《ゲーム》 Character at the Center Slot and this card, STAND and exchange them, during this turn, this card gets +1500 Power.

【A】When this card is placed on Stage from Hand, you may place the top card of your Clock into Waiting Room.
【A】【CXCOMBO】[(1)] When this card attacks, if 「決意の対峙」 is in your Climax Slot, you may pay the cost. If you did, during this turn, this card gets +1000 Power, gains the following Ability. 『【A】This Ability can be activated up to 1 time each turn. When this card's dealt Damage is cancelled, place the top card of your Deck into Waiting Room, deal X Damage to opponent. X is equal to that card's Level +2.』(Climax is considered Level 0. Damage can be cancelled)

【C】During your turn, all your other 《ゲーム》 Character gets +500 Power.
【S】EXPERIENCE [REST this card] If 「切り取られた風景 英梨々」 is in your Level Slot, you draw 1 card, choose 1 card from your Hand, place it into Waiting Room.

【A】When this card attacks, if you have 2 or more other 《ゲーム》 Character, during this turn, this card gets +2000 Power.
【A】【CXCOMBO】When this card's battle opponent becomes REVERSE, if 「魅惑の後輩ボディ」 is in your Climax Slot, place 3 cards from your top Deck into Waiting Room, choose up to X amount of 《ゲーム》 Character from your Waiting Room, return them to Hand. X is equal to the number of Character with Level 0 or lower that placed into Waiting Room by this effect.
【C】RECOLLECTION If 「リトル・ラブ・ラプソディー」 is in your Memory, this card gains the following Ability. 『【A】When this card's battle opponent becomes REVERSE, you may place the top card of your Deck into Stock.』

【C】SUPPORT All your Character in front of this card gets +X Power. X is equal to that Character's Level x500.
【A】When your Character with Level 3 or higher's dealt Damage is cancelled, look at the top card of your Deck, place it on top or bottom Deck.

【A】[(1)] When this card is placed on Stage from Hand, you may pay the cost. If you did, choose 1 「新たなる選択肢 詩羽」 from your Waiting Room, place it into any slot on Stage.
【A】When this card attacks, during this turn, this card gets +X Power. X is equal to the number of your other 《ゲーム》 Character x1000.

【A】[(1)] When this card is placed on Stage from Hand or Deck, you may pay the cost. If you did, search your Deck for up to 1 「門出のはなむけ 英梨々」, place it into any slot on Stage, shuffle your Deck afterwards.
【A】【CXCOMBO】[(1) Place 1 card from Hand into Waiting Room] When this card's deal Damage is not cancelled, if 「出し抜かれ、ボンコツ」 is in your Climax Slot, you may pay the cost. If you did, deal 1 Damage to opponent. (Damage can be cancelled)

【A】[Place the top card of your Deck into Clock] When this card is placed on Stage from Hand, you may pay the cost. If you did, choose 1 「柏木エリのリトラブ色紙」 from your Waiting Room, return it to Hand.
【A】 When this card attacks, choose 1 of your other Character, during this turn, it gets +1500 Power.

【A】[Place 1 Climax from Hand into Waiting Room] When this card is placed on Stage from Hand, you may pay the cost. If you did, choose 1 opponent's Character, send it to Memory, at the beginning of Encore Step, opponent place that Character from Memory into any slot on Stage.
【A】When this card becomes REVERSE, if this card's battle opponent is Level 0 or lower, you may place that Character into Stock. If you did, place 1 card from opponent's bottom Stock into Waiting Room.

【S】[(1) REST this card] Look at up to 2 cards from your top Deck, choose up to 1 card with Level 1 or higher and show it to opponent, add it to Hand, place the remaining cards into Waiting Room. (Climax is considered Level 0)
【S】[Place 1 「突然の再会 出海」 from Hand into Waiting Room] Choose 1 Character with 「出海」 in its name except 「突然の再会 出海」 from your Waiting Room, return it to Hand.
【A】[Place 1 Climax from Hand into Waiting Room] When this card is placed on Stage from Hand, you may pay the cost. If you did, choose 1 《ゲーム》 Character from your Waiting Room, return it to Hand.

【A】When this card is placed on Stage from Hand, reveal the top card of your Deck. If that card is Level 1 or higher, during this turn, this card gets +2000 Power. (Climax is considered Level 0. Return revealed card to its original position)
【A】When this card's battle opponent becomes REVERSE, choose 1 of your other 《ゲーム》 Character, REST it, move it to an empty slot at Back Row.

【C】EXPERIENCE If 「切り取られた風景 英梨々」 is in your Level Slot, this card gets +1000 Power, gains the following Ability. 『【A】[(1) Place this card into Waiting Room] When your other 《ゲーム》 Character is being Front Attacked, you may pay the cost. If you did, return that Character to Hand.』

【A】[Place 2 cards from Hand into Waiting Room] When you use this card's 『ASSIST』, you may pay the cost. If you did, choose 1 opponent's Character with Level higher than opponent's Level, send it to Memory.
【S】【COUNTER】 ASSIST 2500 Level 2 ［(1) Place this card from Hand into Waiting Room］ (Choose 1 of your Characters being Front Attacked, during that turn, it gets ＋2500 Power)

【A】When this card becomes REVERSE, if this card's battle opponent's Level is higher than opponent's Level, you may place that Character into Stock. If you did, place the bottom card of opponent's Stock into Waiting Room.
【A】【CLOCK】ALARM If this card is on top Clock, at the beginning of your Main Phase, choose 1 Character from your Waiting Room and this card, you may exchange them.

【C】SUPPORT All your Character with Level 3 or higher in front of this card gets +2000 Power.
【A】[Place 3 cards from Hand into Waiting Room] When this card is placed on Stage from Hand, you may pay the cost. If you did, search your Deck for up to 2 《ゲーム》 Character and show them to opponent, add them to Hand, shuffle your Deck afterwards.

【A】 When this card becomes REVERSE, reveal the top card of your Deck. If that card is a Character with Level 0 or lower, add it to Hand. (If not, return revealed card to its original position)
【A】【CLOCK】ALARM If this card is on top Clock, and you have 3 or more 《ゲーム》 Character, at the beginning of your Climax Phase, choose 1 of your Character, during this turn, it gets +2000 Power.
【C】 If this card is at the Center Slot of Front Row, this card gets ＋1 Level and ＋2500 Power.

【A】When this card is placed on Stage from Hand, if you have 2 or more other 《ゲーム》 Character, you may draw 1 card. If you did, choose 1 card from your Hand, place it into Waiting Room.
【A】[Return 2 Character from your Waiting Room into Deck, shuffle your Deck afterwards] When this card is placed on Stage from Hand, you may pay the cost. If you did, during this turn, this card gets +1 Soul.
【S】[REST this card] Choose 1 of your 《ゲーム》 Character, during this turn, it gets +1500 Power.
【A】[(1)] When this card is placed on Stage from Hand, you may pay the cost. If you did, choose 1 card from your Hand and 1 card from Level Slot, exchange them.
【C】All opponent's Character gains 『【A】ENCORE [(2)]』.
【C】 If the Level of the Character facing this card is higher than this card's Level, this card cannot Front Attack.
【S】【COUNTER】 ASSIST 2500 Level 1 ［(1) Place this card from Hand into Waiting Room］ (Choose 1 of your Characters being Front Attacked, during that turn, it gets +2500 Power)
【COUNTER】Choose 1 of your Character, during this turn, it gains the following Ability. 『【A】When this card is placed into Waiting Room from Stage, you may return this card to Hand.』

【C】 All your Characters get +1000 Power, +1 Soul.
(Flame：When this card is Triggered, if your current attacking Character's damage is cancelled, deal 1 damage to your opponent)

【S】CONCENTRATION ［(1) REST this card］ Flip the top 4 cards of your Deck, place them into Waiting Room. For each Climax among those cards, search your Deck for up to 1 《ゲーム》 Character and show it to opponent, add it to Hand, shuffle your Deck afterwards.

If you did, during this attack, perform Trigger Check 2 times during Trigger Step.』『【A】When this card is being Front Attacked, you may return this card to Hand.』

【S】[Place this card into Waiting Room] If your Level is 1 or higher, choose 1 「感情の爆発 恵」 from your Waiting Room, place it into this card's previous slot on Stage.
